Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45480 affecting package hyperv-daemons for versions less than 6.6.35.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-45480 affecting package hyperv-daemons for versions less than 6.6.35.1-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package hyperv-daemons is earlier than 6.6.35.1-1, affected by CVE-2021-45480
